metadata.name: Artist's Nails (30th October 2022)
metadata.description: Pure artist’s DNA. Both hair and nails are composed of keratin, a tough protein that gives them their characteristic strength and durability. The DNA within our cells contains the genetic instructions that determine the characteristics of our hair and nails. Genetic variations can impact the colour, texture, thickness, and growth patterns. This series is a life journey, charting factors such as genetics, lifestyle and environment, which affect the growth and appearance of the artist’s hair and nails. No more editions will be minted after the death of the artist. Purchase of the NFT is accompanied, via unlockable content found at dadadotdot.com, by a digital download of the original RAW file image, out-takes from the series, a copy of the Dada Dot Dot Artist Manifesto and “physical residue” that posts free-of-charge globally.
metadata.Hidden Property: The original RAW file image, out-takes from the series and “physical residue” is available to the first owner by connecting their wallet to the artist's website.
